alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 24 at 2:21PM MST until February 25 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ TO 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Primarily areas of La Paz, Yuma, and northeastern Riverside Counties will be affected. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ to 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Potential for blowing dust.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
